backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining state, authorization mixins, and extensive content-related types for sections, products, blocks, images, and admin updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature descriptions, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles in UI, admin features, routing, and content management.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global providers, and landing page layout with all major sections and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component showing bilingual content, statistics cards, icons, and fade‑in animations.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContentBlo: Admin tool for creating content blocks with text, images, ordering, visibility, and section assignment.
frontend/src/components/admin/Diagnostic: Admin diagnostic panel that tests auth, admin status, product fetching, and CRUD operations with detailed step results.
frontend/src/components/admin/HowToOrder: Admin UI for listing, creating, and editing How-To-Order steps with image upload and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/InstagramF: Form-based admin tool to configure Instagram feed settings including handle, embed code, titles, descriptions, visibility, and order.
frontend/src/components/admin/PackagesMa: Admin interface for managing packages, supporting create, edit, delete, and image uploads.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductsMa: Admin tool to add, edit, and delete products with fields for multilingual text, pricing, and image upload.
frontend/src/components/admin/SectionsMa: Admin management UI for custom sections with multilingual text, visibility toggles, ordering, and image/background uploads.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: A contact form component with localized labels, input handling, and a success toast on submit.
Fetches and renders customizable, ordered sections and blocks with localization and optional backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays brand info, quick navigation links, and contact details using localized text.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: A responsive header with scroll behavior, navigation links, language toggle, and admin access logic.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: A full‑screen hero section with background image, floating icons, localized text, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/HowToOrder.tsx: Renders a multi-step 'How to Order' section with icons, translations, and scroll-to-contact behavior.
frontend/src/components/InstagramFeed.ts: Displays an Instagram section using admin-configured embed code or handle, with language-based text and intersection animations.
frontend/src/components/Packages.tsx: Shows a grid of package cards with images, tags, and translated titles and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Lists product cards with images, tags, and translated names and descriptions in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides a React context for language selection and string translations between English and Spanish.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin status, products, and related backend resources.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles, CSS variables, dark mode themes, and utility classes like fade-in animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard, handling authentication, admin checks, profile setup, navigation, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: React page handling Internet Identity login, admin-status checks, and an optional bootstrap flow to assign the current user the admin role.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, architecture notes, known issues, and feature requirements for restoring and stabilizing the app.
